Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Gradually \Grad"u*al*ly\, adv. 1. In a gradual manner. [1913 Webster]
2. In degree. [Obs.] [1913 Webster]
Human reason doth not only gradually, but specifically, differ from the fantastic reason of brutes. --Grew. [1913 Webster]
gradually adv : in a gradual manner; "the snake moved gradually toward its victim" [syn: {bit by bit}, {step by step}]
